t: Mister Chefer Instant Read Thermometer Review And Rating – A Durable Thermometer Built To Last!
s: October 20, 2022 - With an instant read thermometer, you don’t need a separate tool for candy and meat. At least, Mister Chefer’s thermometer does double-duty as a candy thermometer, and given its accuracy, it actually does a better job than specifically branded thermometers.
